tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care, Prenatal Care,Child Birth Education,
review:
Dr.Ashwini was our doctor right from pregnancy detection to delivery and postnatal care. With complications of fetal anaemia in 32nd week and risk of preterm delivery, she supported us right through to deliver a healthy girl baby in the 38th week. The doctor till the last minute was trying for Normal Vaginal Delivery, but due to multiple complications we had to opt for C-Section. 

She is very positive and takes genuine interest in the patient. All through the pregnancy she was accessible to me from answering silly questions to allaying fears over procedures such as FBT (in our case) over phone. She even went the extra mile in following-up with me about results of ultrasounds after week 34 and fetal movement monitoring whenever we were in doubt. 

Each of my counselling with her, she encouraged me and made me feel completely comfortable. She devotes a lot of time for her sessions and hence long wait times might be expected. She is also accessible at the Sthree and Shishu clinic which was closer to our house. 

Pregnancy can be the time of anxiety and excitement. My husband and I would like to thank her for her excellent care and support. 

Highly recommend this doctor to anyone who is looking for a good doctor with personal connect with her patients.

tags: None
review:
I consulted Dr Ashwini through out my pregnancy and delivery. She is very positive by nature and she gave me confidence throughout my journey of pregnancy. She is always approachable and explains things clearly . I faced some bleeding issues during my 5th month and she took care of them very well. She encouraged me for normal delivery and kept explaining and instructing the do and don'ts at every respective trimester. I appreciate her patience in listening my pain points through out my pregnancy. She instructed for all right tests and medications timely. I am now  proud mom of a healthy baby boy :-) Dr. Ashwini also took care of me after my delivery. Best thing i like about her is ,she will reply to my each and every whatsap messages. Trust me, that was so much of relief to me as a first time mom. 

Dr. Ashwini is very professional and experienced doctor . My entire pregnancy and child birth went smooth with her guidance . I am indeed thankful to her .I recommend her for all new moms to be. Go for her ladies she is too good. :-)

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I never recommend Dr. Ashwini to anyone. I believe there is a big difference between her friendly behaviour and her treatment. We planned our first child delivery under her guidance. Till 6th month of pregnancy everything was fine until there was no complications. At end of 6th month my wife faced problem of premature placenta. Suddenly all her behaviour changed and she started blaming us for everything. *** **** ****** *** ****** ******* ** ** **** ** ***** ****** She  asked us to get my wife admitted to monitor her movements. In two days bill shoot up around 66k and in a single day just to monitor the patient she came 6 times and charged 6 consultation fees for a day, if there is any emergency I believe she will stay with the patient. On day-2 my wife got detected with Covid positive and the moment the positive report came she stopped all the treatment and forced us to transfer my wife in a tie-up hospital with the statement that if there is any complication doctor from that hospital will deliver the baby without informing the patient party at 7th week and keep the baby in NICU for a month but in all these decisions she will not be a part. *** ********* **** *** ** *** **** ******** *** ** ****** ***** ********** * ***** ***** ** ******** ******** ***** *********** *** ******* ******* ********* * *** **** *** ******** **** I decided to get my wife discharged  and take her out of these.At the time of discharge Dr. Ashwini made me sign one declaration that says my decision of discharge may cause of death of my unborn child. So I will strongly urge everyone think twice before you select her as your doctor *** ****** ** **** *** ******** *** *** ******* ******* * **** ***** ***** *** *** ********* ** *** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Highly Recommend Dr. Ashwini P, This was our first Pregnancy and right through the phase she was friendly,approachable and helpful.

Though we consulted her in Motherhood, she is also available in Sthree & Shishu clinic and was always available in either of them for any help or consultation.

What is highly commendable is the fact that she gives personal attention to each person and is patient enough to hear our concerns and give enough time to make us understand during each phase of pregnancy.

Regards
Megha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy care and management,
review: Have been consulting Dr.Ashwini with regards to my maternity related concern and issues. I delivered a baby girl on 25th April 2019 at Indiranagar Motherhood hospital. Dr.Ashwini - more than a doc she was like an elder sister or a family member who took care of me and always kept advising on do's & dont's. During every consultation she ensured to understand my concerns and provide an appropriate solutions to the same. Hats off to her level of commitment and determination that she shows towards pregnant mother. I am very happy that my maternity ended with a good note of normal delivery and was blessed by an angel.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr.Ashwini P at Motherhood is an extremely friendly and supportive doctor. She is always available to guide you and help you. This is one of the most important traits of a doctor. 

She goes through all details and only post thorough analysis does she conclude anything. She was recommended to me by my friends and I would surely recommend her to my friends and peers.

I'm happy with my experience with Dr.Ashwini and looking forward to continued support and delightful experience from Motherhood.

tags: None
review: I am 30 above high risk pregnancy.Doctor took special care to ensure all aspects of the pregnancy is progressing correctly.She was available in all emergency situations.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ashwini is a great doctor .. She is so friendly . She will take endless time to lend her ears patiently and then respond back in lucid language clarifying all queries and trying to give a better understanding .. She took a major emergency delivery decision for which my baby is safe Today. Thank you for Everything Dr. Ashwini

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My friend referred Dr. Ashwini for my mother’s treatment. She is very friendly and explained the procedure well to my mother. My mom went with lots of anxiety and fear of the surgery, but in the very first visit itself she felt extremely comfortable with the Dr’s explanation. The surgery also went on well. Her post surgery visit made my mom feel much better. I strongly recommend Dr. Ashwini for her friendliness and expertise in the field. Thank you ma’am.

review: first experience was bit OK..but second time was not good. as doctor not listening to patient. As every person eating rabbit is different. Doctor should not intervene too much . should suggest proper ways to improve eating during pregnancy. if patient is telling her problems Doctor is ignoring and giving techinal answers...which normal patient do not understand. so bye Madam for sometime!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Writing on behlf of my wife. Ashwini doctor took care of my wife really well and it was a normal delivery. Our case was bit complicated as her blood showed ANA+, she suggested to take light dose of asprin to avoid blood cloat and with God's grace and Ashwini doctors help we got a healthy baby thru a normal delivery. Will recommend Ashwini doctor to all my friends and relativies.  Thank you doctor! - Sajai &  Anu Varghese

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Ashwini is a very practical doctor. I have been consulting her from the time I am trying to conceive and now I am in my first trimester. She gives me clear solutions to every query I have. She listens patiently and also always responds to Whatsapp queries for any doubts and urgent consultation. I highly recommend Dr. Ashwini.

tags: None
review: I met miss ashwini before also for infection she is takes time to explain wats the problem which many doctors dont now a days . I recoverd fast and dint needed to go back. Now for this problem she dint give much my the ways she councels is empathising u feel better as get heard of ur pain. She doesn't give unnecessary medications and test . She is really good .. thank u .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is an excellent doctor. *** ** *** **** ****** ********* ** ***********she insists on normal delivery..  She handled my pregnancy very well.. I had Pre term labour and high urine infection in 8 month... There was 90% chances for c sec but she delivered my baby girl normal... I strongly recommend her... She always explain each and every thing very nicely and no sugar coated talks... She is wonderful

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr ashwini is a caring, down to earth doctor and most imprtantlt she explains each and everything about health issues clearly and in detail. she has managed my high risk pregnancy complicated with high BP efficietly and i am blessed with a baby girl. Thanks a lot to her, definitely recommend her to all women requiring expert and friendly consultation

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Apart from waiting time rest everything is good. 10:30 appointment people visit at 11:30 and they directly going to meet doctor won't be acceptable. We are booked on time and reached here on time. But still waiting to meet doctor. Almost 45 mins from the booked time over. But we still waiting to meet doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Doctor is good experienced, Does not tell you to go for additional tests. *** ********* ***** She does not seem to be  running after money which i have seen in metro cities now a days. Her suggestions are natural and gives time to patients. listen to the queries and explain those queries. She is never in hurry mode. **** **********
Overall Very Good Experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I am happy and doctor friendly treted I recomd my friends this hospital main ladies visit your problem its very. Butyfull

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor has forced us to do urine and blood tests and advised us to show her the report and take the medicine. We reached the clinic and collected the report however the receptionist did not allow us to go and show the report and asked us to take appointment and come after five days. It would have taken two minutes for her to write tablets .This is how they treat customers. Ailment is now and he asks us to come after five days.We visited for the first time and no body told us the procedure to follow post reaching there whereas we have met the receptionist post reaching. I have to go again to another doctor and get treated now. No respect for people's money and time. Not at all recommend to visit the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I started consulting Dr.Ashwini from May 2017 and she was the best choice i made for my health problems. Went to her with thyroid and PCO she is very friendly and listens to your every single silly query. With her motivation and confidence i conceived and she took care of my high risk pregnancy with utmost care. Any silly doubt and she was just a watsapp msg away. Without taking a single risk with my health and my babies today i can happily say that im blessed with twin boys all because of Dr.Ashwini. Her timely decision to get an emergency c Section was very helpful. Wish you all the best. Thank you Dr.Ashwini from Vasant n Ratisha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am sharing my experiences today after 1 year of doctor check up.Just for info I suffered on ectopic pregnancy before visiting here.We meet first time to Dr. Aswini for pre-pregnancy consultation. Doctor didn't prescribed me any medicine and she just boost our confidence. To be honest she's a person who cleared all my doubts, treated me with love and attention. She is not time bounded in patients medical condition discussion. Now we have a one month old baby girl.She is very friendly and caring. She also shared her personal mobile number for emergency purpose. Without notification, She informed all the precautionary in my course of pregnancy. She generally don't take any risk other than her specialisation. Thank you Dr Aswini.Wish you all the best for your career.

tags: None
review: We visited stree and shishu clinic as it was near to our house and we were unsure of the doctor.  But we were in for a very pleasant surprise. She not only treated with care but also devoted ample amount of time explaining each and every bit of minor information regarding delivery and pregnancy period. We are extremely impressed and happy with dr Ashwini,  who gave very good advise and is a very concerned person. We highly recommend her to any pregnant lady.
